name: Stardust Era Explorers
description:
Alone on a far away planet, you awake without memory. In order to understand what happened here, you must use your radar to recollect memory fragments. Make sure to grab energy cells along the way to expand your battery life. Stopping at the Recharging Station by the tents will refill your battery over time. Collect all the memories and find what awaits!

Made for the Global Games Jam 2021

Credit:
